description:
Anyone can easily slice it !

Slice it! is a puzzle game, where you slice different figures into the same ratio 
(or surface area).

Let's do some brain exercise!

1. 100 different stages + α
Each stage contains a variety of figures, and stage can be added through an update. 
In the latter half of stages, different kinds of obstacles are introduced to make the game more enticing.

2. Use a hint,  if it’s hard
Refer to a hint if you have no idea how to clear a stage. Since each hint becomes available when you clear a stage perfectly, it can be used in difficult stages.

3. English, Dutch, French, Italian and Spanish  supported.
